analysis.description:
Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/13/0xda8fe472e1beae12973fa48e9a1d9595f752fce0.sol#114-115:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/13/0xda8fe472e1beae12973fa48e9a1d9595f752fce0.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.16 (/unique_chucks/13/0xda8fe472e1beae12973fa48e9a1d9595f752fce0.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_a' of Slotthereum.getNumber (/unique_chucks/13/0xda8fe472e1beae12973fa48e9a1d9595f752fce0.sol#117) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_minBetAmount' of Slotthereum.setMinBetAmount (/unique_chucks/13/0xda8fe472e1beae12973fa48e9a1d9595f752fce0.sol#190) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_maxBetAmount' of Slotthereum.setMaxBetAmount (/unique_chucks/13/0xda8fe472e1beae12973fa48e9a1d9595f752fce0.sol#196) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_pointer' of Slotthereum.setPointer (/unique_chucks/13/0xda8fe472e1beae12973fa48e9a1d9595f752fce0.sol#203) is not in mixedCase
